docblock.description: Base API client, handles communication, retry, versioning etc.
Smartfile API URL.
This function decodes a chunked http response
This function performs an HTTP request and parses the response.
docblock.long-description: It raises an exception if the server cannot be contacted or if the server returns a status other than 201. Any status other that 201 results in the exception receiving the HTTP status in addition to the returned error message.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Extra Headers Such as Authentication Information

docblock.description: API client that uses OAuth tokens.
docblock.long-description: Layers a more complex form of authentication useful for 3rd party access on top of the base Client.

docblock.description: Smartfile API URL.
SmartFile Client Token You get it when you register your application.
SmartFile Client Secret You get it when you register your application.
SmartFile Request Token This is given to you after you call getRequestToken() and should be saved by your application.
SmartFile Request Secret This is given to you after you call getRequestToken() and should be saved by your application.
SmartFile Access Token This is given to you after you call getAccessToken() and should be saved by your application.
SmartFile Access Secret This is given to you after you call getAccessToken() and should be saved by your application.
nonce char list
Private constructor.
docblock.long-description: Set the oauth token and secret once when you instantiate this class.

docblock.description: Generate a random string of x chars
Override the parent class to add OAuth Authentication here.
docblock.long-description: Actually makes the HTTP request

tag.name: param
tag.description: Extra Headers Such as Authentication Information

docblock.description: The first step of the OAuth workflow.
The second step of the OAuth workflow.
docblock.long-description: Send the user to the URL obtained. They will authorize the application to access their account. The user will be given a verifier if a callback is not specified.

docblock.description: The final step of the OAuth workflow.
docblock.long-description: After this the client can make API calls.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Verifier given to user or passed to your callback.

docblock.description: This function makes the User add API call.
docblock.long-description: It uses the BasicClient class to handle the transport. Additional API calls could be supported simply by writing additional wrappers that create the $data array and use BasicClient to do the grunt work.

docblock.description: This function makes the User delete API call.
docblock.long-description: It uses the BasicClient class to handle the transport. Additional API calls could be supported simply by writing additional wrappers that create the $data array and use BasicClient to do the grunt work.
